name: Virgo Isles
description:
Plant some trees, lady of the harvest Virgo demands it!

Use your map to locate each island then plant some trees by shooting them with the seed canon. Each island is represented by a star on the mini-map.

- Sail with the wind for a boost in speed! Wind direction is indicated by the red flag
atop the boat mast.

-This journey is a long one, so boat maintenance is essential. Make sure to expel any water that happens to seep into the cabin. Not doing so will slow your travel, and this journey is already long enough.

Controls
mouse for camera
a,d = sail direction
q = toggle turbo
z = toggle anchor (stop)
e = empty water
f = fire cannon
